Class MyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • MyController

  • public class MyController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller for the application. This manages the other classes and determines the overall behaviour of the program.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Edward

    • Constructor Detail

      • MyController

        public MyController()

    • Method Detail

      • Initialise

        public void Initialise()
        Called by MainProgram to initialise the application. Calls methods that set up all the starting values.

      • command

        public void command(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Detect when text is entered into the TextField. Passes this text to the parser to interpret as a command.
        Parameters:
        event - When text is entered and submitted into the TextField.

      • turnLeft

        public void turnLeft(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Turn left method. This calls the changeDirection method and displays the new view.
        Parameters:
        event - When the 'Turn Left' button is clicked.

      • turnRight

        public void turnRight(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Turn right method. This calls the changeDirection method and displays the new view.
        Parameters:
        event - When the 'Turn Right' button is clicked.

      • move

        public void move(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method to move between rooms when the move button is pressed. If the move is allowed it changes the currentRoom and displays the new view. If not a message is relayed to the TextArea stating this.
        Parameters:
        event - The 'Move Forward' button being clicked.

      • changeDirection

        public void changeDirection(boolean clockwise,
                            java.lang.String currentDirection)
        Updates the currentDirection field upon turning.
        Parameters:
        clockwise - Boolean value that is true to turn clockwise, and false to turn anti-clockwise.
        currentDirection - The direction that is currently being faced.

      • getObject

        public void getObject(Command command)
        Pick up an item upon getting 'pick' as the command input. If the item is in the location and you are not already carrying the maximum number of items then it is added to your carried items.
        Parameters:
        command - The command passed into the TextField.

      • dropObject

        public void dropObject(Command command)
        Drop an item upon getting 'drop' as the command input.
        Parameters:
        command - The command passed into the TextField.

      • displayObjects

        public void displayObjects()
        Display in the user interface the items currently in the location. Only maxNumberOfItemsDisplayed are allowed to be displayed.
